Articles.Content:
Hello KSP,

I have now had several behind-the-scenes discussions with previous friends concerning many issues. I'm happy to say that almost everything has been resolved from that bad time in my life, and I've said several well deserved apologies. So, now, at the request of Captain Skunky I'm going to reintroduce myself.

Hi, I'm Drakomis. You can call me Travis.

Okay....um...I like launching rockets, watching the capsule explode, shooting things into the Mun aaaannnddd....I plan on eventually figuring out how to make a rocket large enough to go to the other planets (Seriously, how?!).

So...yea...

Hi again!

-Travis

Welcome back to the forums, Drakomis.

It's not often I say that but Welcome Back and I'm glad you sorted out your issues.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!
Welcome back Drakomis, have fun on the forums and in KSP

Welcome back Drakomis, have fun on the forums and in KSP

Thank you very much!

Welcome back to the forums, Drakomis.

It's not often I say that but Welcome Back and I'm glad you sorted out your issues.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Thank you! I shall get on that!....or continue to, muahahhaha.
